[Groovy] Class MultiLangController

java.lang.Object
  corecode.MultiLangController

class MultiLangController

The central controller that is accessed from the External environment (JAVA) for MultiLang integration

Constructor Detail

MultiLangController

MultiLangController(java.lang.String encodingRead, java.lang.String encodingWrite)
Constructor
Parameters:
encodingRead - The encoding used to read from source file
If the encoding is not mentioned, then 'UTF-8' will be used
encodingWrite - The encoding used to write into destination file
If the encoding is not mentioned, then 'UTF-8' will be used

 
Method Detail

updateMultiLang

java.lang.Object updateMultiLang(java.lang.String sourceFilePath, java.lang.String destinationFilePath, java.util.ArrayList underlinedArrayList)
Parameters:
sourceFilePath - The String that denotes the location of the source file
destinationFilePath - The String that denotes the location of the destination file
underlinedArrayList - The array list that has the MultiLang IDs of all entries that should have the UNDERLINE tag
